Redux

Introduction

Redux is a JavaScript library to manage the state of your application - it helps you to manage the data you display and how you respond to user actions.

Install Redux

Redux can be installed using NPM (Node Package Manager). Open the terminal and enter the following command to install Redux as a dependency of your project. You will require a package.json file.

                        

$ npm install redux --save

Store

The store is an object that holds the complete state of your application.
